title: Parsons traded to Packers, gets record contract
content: Star pass rusher Micah Parsons has been traded by the Cowboys to the Packers and has agreed to a record contract for a non-quarterback with Green Bay.

title: A new look in Green Bay: Trading for Parsons continues Packers' aggressive offseason
content: Signs of change in Green Bay include paying up for to trade for Parsons after finally taking a WR in the first round.

title: Venus earns first US Open doubles win since '14
content: Venus Williams, who won 14 Grand Slam doubles titles with sister Serena, teamed with Leylah Fernandez to win her first doubles match at the US Open since 2014.

title: Seager has appendectomy; return date unknown
content: Rangers shortstop Corey Seager, who has a team-high 21 home runs this season, had an appendectomy after experiencing abdominal pain during Wednesday's game.

title: Vol for life: UT gives Barnes, 71, lifetime contract
content: Tennessee gave basketball coach Rick Barnes a contract extension Thursday that automatically extends a year every April 15 after his current contract expires in 2028.

title: Messi set for 'very special' final WCQ in Argentina
content: Lionel Messi is set to play his final World Cup qualifier at home in Argentina when Venezuela visits Buenos Aires next week.

title: Packers' Love OK playing with repaired thumb
content: Packers quarterback Jordan Love said that he has "no concerns" ahead of the Sept. 7 opener against the Lions but that his repaired thumb will have to be protected using a brace similar to what he has worn in practice.

title: Guardians release longtime first baseman Santana
content: Guardians released first baseman Carlos Santana on Thursday, making the 39-year-old veteran available for teams looking to add a veteran bat.

title: Lewis: Blame Bledsoe for hit that led to Brady era
content: Mo Lewis, breaking a long media silence, contends in a soon-to-be-released book that it's Drew Bledsoe -- not him -- who deserves the blame for the infamous hit on Sept. 23, 2001 that triggered the Tom Brady era.

title: 💗 Travis Hunter and wife welcome first child
content: The two-way Jacksonville Jaguars rookie and his wife document the journey to their son's birth on YouTube.

title: We picked X factors for all 32 NFL teams: Who could be a difference-maker this season?
content: What do Ricky Pearsall, Riley Moss, Breece Hall and Rashan Gary have in common? The success of their teams could depend on them.

title: Inside the rise of the home run robbery: Why baseball's most thrilling play is happening more than ever
content: Nothing brings a crowd to its feet like a homer being taken away. Here's what's powering the rise in outfielder thievery.

title: The game is on the line: Which WNBA player gets the last shot?
content: Some thrive in high-pressure situations. Some are the best players, period. Who is that go-to for every team?

title: 25 under 25: Clark, then who? Ranking the best young players
content: Which players have the most future potential? Caitlin Clark, Paige Bueckers and Angel Reese make our list.

title: College football Week 1 preview: Player expectations, freshmen to watch and more
content: Ahead of Week 1, here's what to expect from Jeremiah Smith and Arch Manning, freshmen to watch and notable offseason quotes.

title: Lee Corso's impact felt far beyond 'GameDay' audience
content: The larger-than-life face of college football has touched so many, from fans and players to colleagues and friends.

title: 'He wasn't trying to be anybody else': How Aaron Rodgers won over his Steelers teammates
content: Aaron Rodgers made up for lost offseason time by getting to know his newest teammates. Will it matter?

title: Inside Caleb Williams' 'unapologetic' approach to Year 2 as Bears QB
content: Williams has his flair back as he enters the season with high expectations under new coach Ben Johnson.

title: MLB Power Rankings: Where every team stands as final month approaches
content: As we enter September, every team has something it's focusing on in the final stretch -- ranging from playoff prep to building for next season.

title: The best NHL draft pick ever, at every slot from No. 1 to 224
content: Who's the best No. 1 pick? What about No. 27? We analyzed every draft from 1967 to 2025 to find the answers.

title: Mike Clay's Playbook, Part 3: How to manage your team post-draft
content: The draft is just the beginning of the fun. Mike Clay gives you a guide to being a savvy, championship-winning manager.

title: Reaction: Good for Arsenal and Spurs, bad for PSG, must-see games
content: The Champions League is back! So let's unpack all the must-see games, winners and losers, and talking points from Thursday's draw for the 2025-26 League Phase.

title: USMNT countdown to the World Cup: Will Reyna's fresh start save 2026 hopes?
content: Gio Reyna finally has a new club, and if he can rebuild his career in Gladbach, he may yet have a place on the USMNT's 2026 World Cup team.

title: Who has a shot at the championship? Predictions for 2025-26 NBA conference and Finals winners
content: Our final Summer Forecast panel reveals its championship predictions for the East and West conferences and the 2026 NBA Finals.

title: Can anyone turn Alcaraz and Sinner's Big Two into a three? Here are 10 candidates
content: Federer and Nadal once seemed set to rule the tennis world. Then Djokovic broke through. Can anyone now join Alcaraz and Sinner's current reign?

title: The five stories that explain why Arch Manning was built for this moment
content: How did the Texas quarterback learn to handle the pressure he's facing as the most famous college football player in the country?

title: Why Rashee Rice accepted his six-game suspension now, and how Chiefs will have to cope
content: With the timing and length of Rice's suspension now known, Andy Reid and the offense can plan their season accordingly.

title: NFL 'Rivalries' uniforms revealed for AFC East, NFC West teams
content: Teams from the AFC East and NFC West will don special uniforms during a single home game against a division rival in the 2025 season.

title: Ben Shelton and Trinity Rodman relationship timeline
content: The NWSL player playfully challenged the tennis star with a question about his 2nd-round US Open performance.

title: The beginning of the end for Amorim? Man United's shocking loss to fourth-tier Grimsby raises the possibility
content: Ruben Amorim and Manchester United arrived in Grimsby keen to start winning again. Instead, they made history with their latest low point.

title: Instant meme! Man United boss Amorim's tactics board vs. Grimsby goes viral
content: As United lurched into yet another catastrophe, an image of Amorim summed up the club's current situation.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Woltemade nearing move to Newcastle
content: Newcastle United are reportedly set to get a new striker in Stuttgart's Nick Woltemade. Transfer Talk has the latest news, gossip and rumors.

title: Dickie V: Preseason All-Rolls Royce teams and Diaper Dandies
content: The best of the best PTPers, including freshmen, who will make you stand up and say, "Are you serious, baby?!"

title: A contract, designer wardrobe and UFC win: Inside Baisangur Susurkaev's best week
content: Baisangur Susurkaev entered the week of Aug. 12 unknown and ended it Dana White's "favorite fighter."

title: Way-too-early UFC at the White House fight card
content: Let's take an early look at a UFC event at the White House in 2026 that Dana White says is "going to happen."

title: 'Modi's war'? How US, EU are 'fuelling', funding Russia-Ukraine conflict
content: Peter Navarro's claim that India's Russian oil purchases fuel the Ukraine war has sparked controversy, highlighting a rift between Washington and New Delhi. While India defends its energy needs and points to Western hypocrisy, the US and EU's own economic ties with Russia are under scrutiny. India's defiance of US pressure is expected to continue with increased Russian oil imports.

title: US says no new visas: Trump not opening doors to new Chinese students
content: The White House clarified that President Trump is not increasing student visas for Chinese nationals, despite recent speculation. The 600,000 figure cited refers to a two-year cumulative count, representing a continuation of existing policy. This clarification addresses criticism from those who viewed the number as a policy shift amid ongoing US-China trade negotiations.

title: 'To further national interests': PM Modi heads to Japan, China; what's on agenda
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi's visits to Japan and China aim to bolster India's national interests by strengthening strategic partnerships and expanding economic and technological cooperation. He will attend the 15th Annual Summit in Japan and the SCO Summit in China, focusing on regional peace, security, and sustainable development.

title: F-16 crash in Poland: Pilot killed during airshow rehearsal- Video
content: A Polish Air Force F-16 fighter jet crashed during a rehearsal for an airshow in Radom, central Poland, resulting in the tragic death of the pilot. Defence Minister Wladyslaw Kosiniak-Kamysz and Prime Minister Donald Tusk expressed their condolences, honouring the pilot's service and sacrifice. The aircraft belonged to the 31st Tactical Air Base near Poznań.

title: Musk & Altman’s legal tussle: Dispute over Meta 'chat' with Zuckerberg; OpenAI moves court
content: Elon Musk and Sam Altman's legal battle intensifies as Musk's lawyers attempt to block OpenAI from acquiring documents from Meta regarding an alleged $97.4 billion bid for OpenAI's assets. OpenAI claims Musk approached Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg to join the bid, which Zuckerberg declined.

title: ‘Not happy, not surprised’: Trump unsurprised by Russian strikes on Kyiv
content: White House reports Donald Trump's reaction to Russia's Kyiv strikes. He was not happy but not surprised. The strikes resulted in casualties and hit civilian targets. Karoline Leavitt mentioned Ukraine's recent actions against Russian oil refineries. Trump wants a negotiated resolution. Keith Kellogg warned the attacks could hinder peace efforts. The administration claims ongoing diplomatic efforts to end the conflict.

title: Amazon founder Bezos to board: No salary for me; Why he made this choice
content: Jeff Bezos, Amazon's founder, revealed he declined compensation, believing his equity was sufficient motivation. He emphasized wealth creation for others, citing Amazon's $2.1 trillion contribution. Bezos joins tech leaders like Zuckerberg and Buffett in prioritizing value creation over personal enrichment through symbolic or minimal salaries, reflecting a Silicon Valley ethos.

title: Deion Sanders to Travis Hunter: 'I’m gonna do your prenup'; fans question Leanna Lenee marriage
content: Travis Hunter and Leanna Lenee's marriage has faced public scrutiny, fueled by an old video where Deion Sanders advised Hunter to get a prenup. Despite Sanders' advice and fan expectations, Hunter surprisingly didn't sign a prenup before marrying Lenee. Amidst ongoing criticism, Hunter has fiercely defended Lenee, emphasizing their strong bond and mutual support against online hate.

title: AI researcher quits Meta: Reveals reason for exit; followed Zuckerberg’s advice
content: Meta's Superintelligence Lab is experiencing departures, including AI scientist Rishabh Agarwal, who left after five months despite a reported million-dollar salary, citing a desire for "a different kind of risk." Agarwal's exit follows those of other researchers, some of whom have returned to OpenAI, raising questions about Meta's ambitious superintelligence program and its ability to retain top AI talent.

title: NBA Trade Rumors: Russell Westbrook to Sacramento Kings? Team backs off; future unclear
content: NBA star Russell Westbrook's future is uncertain as the Sacramento Kings hesitate to sign him, despite being considered his most likely destination. This leaves the former MVP potentially without a team for the upcoming season. The Kings are reportedly considering trading some of their own guards, including Malik Monk, to free up roster space.

title: Anna Kournikova pregnant at 44: Fourth child with Enrique — baby news after health scare
content: Anna Kournikova, 44, and Enrique Iglesias, 50, are expecting their fourth child, as reported by Hola magazine. This news follows concerns about Kournikova's health after she was seen in a wheelchair earlier this year. The couple, together since 2001 and parents to twins Lucy and Nicholas, 7, and daughter Mary, 5, continue to build their family life in Miami.

title: Taylor Swift vs Ronaldo: Engagement ring showdown — who spent more on love bling?
content: Pop star Taylor Swift and NFL player Travis Kelce got engaged. Swift's ring features an 8-carat diamond. Footballer Cristiano Ronaldo proposed to Georgina Rodríguez. Her ring boasts a 37-carat diamond. Swift's ring is vintage-inspired. Ronaldo's ring is significantly more expensive. Both rings symbolize love and commitment. The rings reflect the couple's personal styles.

title: Michael Jordan’s wife: Inside NBA legend’s love life — past romances to current partner
content: Yvette Prieto, known for her calm demeanor and love for sailing, balances family life with supporting Michael Jordan's endeavors. After meeting in 2008, they married in 2013 and welcomed twin daughters in 2014. Previously, Jordan was married to Juanita Vanoy for 17 years, with whom he had three children before their 2006 divorce.

title: Doris Burke demoted: signs multi‑year ESPN extension; stays in NBA coverage spotlight
content: Doris Burke, who made history as the first woman NBA Finals analyst for ESPN's top team in 2023, has been moved to the No. 2 team alongside Dave Pasch. This surprising change, allegedly prompted by an executive decision, sees Tim Legler taking her place. Despite the demotion, Burke remains with ESPN, having signed a multi-year contract extension.

title: Simple exercise to lower blood sugar after meals, says French biochemist
content: Jessie Inchauspe suggests calf raises after meals. This helps control blood sugar. It activates the soleus muscle. This muscle uses glucose for energy. Do it for 5-10 minutes. It reduces blood sugar spikes. It improves metabolic and heart health. It aids digestion and energy levels. Studies support post-meal muscle activation. Walking is an alternative if calf raises are uncomfortable.

title: Cylinder blast or set afire? Mystery shrouds Nikki's final hours; story shifts again
content: Noida police are reinvestigating Nikki Bhati's death, initially reported as a gas cylinder accident, due to conflicting accounts. Nikki's family alleges dowry harassment and murder by her husband and in-laws, while a hospital memo records Nikki attributing her burns to a cylinder blast.

title: Trump tariffs: India refuses to blink; Russian oil imports set to rise
content: Despite increased US tariffs on Indian exports due to its reliance on Russian oil, India is expected to increase Russian crude imports by 10-20% in September. This move is driven by cheaper prices and Russia's increased export availability.

title: Mark Teixeira: From World Series champ to GOP hopeful — eyes Texas House seat 2025
content: Former MLB star Mark Teixeira announced his candidacy for Texas's 21st Congressional District, succeeding Chip Roy, who is vying for Texas Attorney General. Teixeira, a proud conservative, aims to champion President Trump's "America First" agenda. He pledges to strengthen border security, cut government spending, and defend the Second Amendment, emphasizing teamwork to safeguard Texas values and American liberty.

title: Travis Hunter’s wife revealed: Leanna Lenee sparks fan curiosity; inside Jaguars star’s love life
content: Jacksonville Jaguars' star Travis Hunter and his wife, Leanna Lenee, have captivated fans with their enduring love story. Meeting as teenagers, their bond deepened, leading to a 2025 wedding and the recent birth of their first child. Their journey from young sweethearts to parents showcases resilience and unwavering support amidst Hunter's rising NFL career.

title: Russia's attack on Ukraine receives backlash- Here's what nations said
content: A major Russian air assault on Kyiv resulted in at least 18 deaths and 48 injuries, drawing international condemnation. The EU diplomatic offices were damaged in the attack. Despite the strikes, Russia claims to be open for diplomacy, while continuing to target Ukraine's military infrastructure. The EU and UK summoned Russian envoys, denouncing the strikes, which threaten ongoing peace efforts.

title: 'Never said someone should retire': Bhagwat on 75-yr limit; addresses language row
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat addressed the media on the third day of the organisation's centenary event, emphasizing the importance of values and tradition in education alongside technology. He advocated for Sanskrit study to understand India's knowledge and culture, while clarifying the RSS's coordination with the BJP government, acknowledging potential struggles but denying any quarrel.

title: No ‘dead economy’? India may surpass US as 2nd largest economy in PPP by 2038
content: Despite recent tariffs imposed by the US, a new analysis by EY projects India may overtake the US as the world's second-largest economy in PPP terms by 2038. This growth is fueled by India's dynamic economy, which is outpacing major global economies. While tariffs may slightly impact India's GDP, strategic measures could mitigate the effects.

title: Marathi actor Bal Karve, famous for 'Gundya Bhau' role, passes away at 95
content: Veteran Marathi actor Bal Karve, famous for his role as 'Gundya Bhau' in Chimanrao, died at 95. He was also a civil engineer. Known for his stellar comic timing, Karve was a key figure in Marathi theatre and TV, co-founding Kilbil Balrangmanch. His legacy continues to inspire many.

title: Watch: Indian Army's daredevil rescue mission in Punjab
content: The Indian Army, NDRF, BSF, and IAF have been conducting extensive rescue operations in Punjab's flood-affected districts, including Amritsar, Gurdaspur, and Pathankot. Aviation helicopters evacuated stranded civilians, CRPF personnel, and irrigation officials, while ground teams rescued villagers from rising floodwaters using boats. These efforts provided essential relief and instilled confidence among the distressed population amidst severe flooding reminiscent of 1988.

title: American mom reveals 3 habits she gave up after moving to India
content: American mom Kristen Fischer, now residing in India, reveals how the move prompted significant lifestyle changes. Embracing vegetarianism for health and affordability, she also adopted the jet spray, finding it superior to toilet paper. More profoundly, Fischer shed insecurities and discovered a sense of security, particularly regarding her children's safety, finding peace and confidence in her new home.

title: US tariff impact: Centre assures no 'long-term loss'; export promotion in focus
content: The Commerce Ministry is accelerating the Export Promotion Mission to aid exporters. It acknowledges the impact of 50% US tariffs on sectors like textiles and chemicals. Officials believe this impact will be short-term. They emphasize creating resilient supply chains and diversifying exports. The industry is concerned about slowing orders and liquidity.

title: AIFF, FSDL submit Indian football's way forward to SC; new league season from Dec
content: The All India Football Federation (AIFF) has proposed to the Supreme Court to commence the football season with the Super Cup, with the new league season expected to begin in December. The decision on whether the Indian Super League (ISL) remains the top tier depends on FSDL's participation in an open tender for a commercial partner.

title: India-Canada ties on the mend? New envoy named - who is Dinesh Patnaik
content: Amid strained diplomatic relations, India has appointed Dinesh K Patnaik, a seasoned diplomat from the 1990 IFS batch, as the new High Commissioner to Canada. Patnaik, currently serving as India’s Ambassador to Spain, brings over 30 years of experience from various international missions. This appointment comes after India withdrew its High Commissioner and other diplomats following actions by Canada.

title: PM Modi 'abused': BJP says 'boundaries crossed'; Cong leader apologises
content: The Bharatiya Janata Party has accused Rahul Gandhi's 'Voter Adhikar Yatra' in Bihar of using abusive language against Prime Minister Narendra Modi. A viral video allegedly shows individuals using a slur against PM Modi during the Yatra in Darbhanga district.

title: Jim Irsay's hidden relapse: Colts owner dies at 65 in Beverly Hills
content: A Washington Post investigation revealed that Indianapolis Colts owner Jim Irsay secretly battled a relapse with opioids and ketamine before his death in May 2025. Despite public appearances, Irsay suffered multiple overdoses, including incidents in Turks and Caicos, Indiana, and Florida. His family acknowledged his struggles with addiction and mental health, emphasizing his advocacy and philanthropy.

title: MAGA is blaming Ilhan Omar for Minneapolis shooting and weaponizing trans-identity
content: Following the tragic shooting at Annunciation Catholic School in Minneapolis, which resulted in the deaths of two children and injuries to seventeen others, MAGA-aligned figures have swiftly attempted to politicize the event. They are baselessly blaming Representative Ilhan Omar, pushing a narrative of a 'Red-Green alliance' despite the absence of any evidence linking the shooter to Omar or her politics.

title: Big twist in 'dowry murder': Nikki told docs she suffered burns in cylinder blast
content: The death of Nikki Bhati in Noida is under intense scrutiny as conflicting accounts emerge. While Nikki told doctors she suffered burns in a gas cylinder blast, her sister alleges she was set on fire by her husband due to dowry harassment.

title: How the Trump-Modi friendship came undone in five episodes
content: The relationship between US President Trump and Prime Minister Narendra Modi, once hailed as a bromance, encountered turbulence during Trump's presidency. Key disagreements arose from Trump's offer to mediate in Kashmir, a move rejected by India, and a canceled meeting during Modi's US visit in 2024.

title: India’s school teachers surpass one crore for the first time
content: India has crossed a historic milestone, with over one crore school teachers in 2024–25, marking a significant step toward improved pupil-teacher ratios and higher student retention. Yet, persistent learning gaps and the under-representation of women in leadership, highlighted by the UNESCO GEM Report 2024–25, reveal that numerical growth alone cannot guarantee equitable, high-quality education across the nation.

title: 3 Pak terrorists in Bihar: Cops announce Rs 50k reward; share passport details
content: Intelligence agencies alerted Bihar authorities about three Pakistani terrorists entering through Nepal. Vehicle checks are underway in border areas. Police stations are on high alert. A reward of Rs 50,000 is offered for information. The terrorists, identified as Hasnain, Adil, and Usman, arrived in Kathmandu in August. They are suspected to have entered Bihar through Araria district.

title: Watch: Sachin Tendulkar and family offer prayers at Lalbaugcha Raja
content: Sachin Tendulkar and his family, including his recently engaged son Arjun, visited Lalbaugcha Raja in Mumbai to seek blessings during Ganesh Chaturthi. The family's traditional attire and public appearance drew significant media attention. This visit follows Arjun's engagement to Saaniya Chandhok, confirmed by Sachin himself, marking a new chapter for the young Tendulkar.

title: Dana White stunned: MMA robot defies protocol; G1 League demo sparks chaos
content: During a UFC demo in Shanghai, a Unitree G1 humanoid robot unexpectedly confronted Dana White, deviating from its planned martial arts routine. White quickly evaded the robot, escaping unharmed. The incident, which went viral, has sparked discussions about the challenges of controlling advanced robots and their potential for unpredictable behavior in public demonstrations.

title: The people of Bihar want to oust NDA, voter rights rally has become a lifeline: K.C. Venugopal
content: Congress general secretary (organisation) says any talk about infiltrators is the typical polarisation bogey of the BJP to divert the attention of voters from real issues; INDIA bloc’s fight against ‘vote theft’ has become a public movement in Bihar, he says

title: Freed from bondage after a decade, tribal labourers in Odisha travel back home on foot
content: For ten years, the tribal man was forced to toil in a brick kiln like a captive, occasionally allowed to visit home only on the condition that another family would remain as collateral hostage

title: Rajasthan becomes first State to issue guidelines on stray dogs after Supreme Court directive
content: The Supreme Court’s ruling pertained to the control of stray canine population in the National Capital Region.

title: RTA told to take steps to increase time gap between private buses
content: High Court says relying on policemen to regulate traffic flow could be tried out instead of signal lights

title: Questions in Justice Nagarathna’s dissent remain even as Justices Aradhe, Pancholi to be sworn in as Supreme Court judges on August 29
content: The lone woman apex court judge’s questions in her dissent included the reasons behind the transfer of Justice Pancholi from Gujarat to Patna in July 2023

title: Bihar police officers to get ₹1.50 crore insurance in case of death on duty
content: In June 2025, a speeding SUV had killed female constable Komal Kumari on Atal Path in Patna during a vehicle checking drive. She is the first police officer to get the insurance amount of ₹1.5 crore in the police department.

title: VIT Chennai signs 7 MoUs and patent commercialisation agreement at industry-academia summit
content: Themed ‘Smart Mobility, Sustainable Manufacturing, and Automation for a Resilient Future’, the two-day conclave brought together 48 industry experts, over 140 industry participants, and 55 academicians

title: A dream derailed
content: Touted as the third pillar of public transport after BMTC and Namma Metro, the ambitious Bengaluru Suburban Railway Project is mired in delays, contractor exits, and land acquisition hurdles, finds Darshan Devaiah B. P.

title: Telangana explains KWDT-II on how water drawal from Nagarjunasagar to Andhra enhanced
content: Senior counsel C.S. Vaidyanathan presents arguments for Telangana on the decisions taken detrimental to it by AP

title: Jammu and Kashmir High Court grants U.T. government 20 days to submit final stand on Gulmarg lease issue
content: Dozens of hoteliers are unable to extend their lease period after the Lt.-Governor’s administration replaced the rules for lease with a new one in 2022

title: DPR study on extending Kochi metro to Angamaly begins
content: The study marks the beginning of the fulfilment of the long-pending demand to connect the metro to the international airport and extend it further to Angamaly, says KMRL managing director

title: Entire village in Bihar shown residing in one house, claims Rahul
content: The Congress' post on X said that in Nidani village of Gaya district, under Barachatti assembly segment, "all 947 voters" of a booth have been shown to be "residents of house number six".

title: CPI(M), UDF lock horns over protests against Shafi Parambil in Kozhikode
content: DYFI alleges that MP is ‘protecting’ Mamkootathil; UDF views the protests as a direct attack on Shafi who trounced CPI(M) veteran K.K. Shailaja in its stronghold Vadakara in the 2024 Lok Sabha polls

title: Kozhikode MCH to procure surgical devices amid shortage in Cardiology dept.
content: The issue arose after distributors of these devices stopped supplies, citing pending dues worth hundreds of crores

title: Kamareddy flood | Moisture from Bay of Bengal and wind from Arabian Sea brought deluge: IMD scientist
content: We put out a red alert at 10 a.m. on August 27. The red alert has been there for the past 30 hours and the total rainfall is now 65 cm., says IMD scientist

title: Pre-test for Census 2027 to be conducted in October-November
content: Pre-test will only include questions from the first phase; to evaluate data collection methodologies, logistics, mobile app and other digital tools, identify potential issues on the field, Registrar General and Census Commissioner tells State Directorates of Census Operations

title: Water levels begin to recede as J&K battles flood impact
content: CM directs officials to restore transportation and electricity in all affected areas; Jammu-Srinagar NH still out of bounds for traffic, schools across Jammu division to remain closed till August 30

title: DSC 2025: Officials urged to release merit-cum-roster lists of  selected candidates
content: Release of call letters to the candidates selected in DSC-2025 in online mode had led to confusion and misconceptions that some of the qualified candidates did not receive their call letters, says Progressive Democratic Front MLC Gopi Murthy

title: China, India should jointly safeguard peace in border areas: Chinese military
content: During the talks, the two sides had a candid and in-depth exchange of views on the China-India boundary question in a positive and constructive spirit, reaching multiple consensuses, Mr. Zhang said

title: Nearly 60% of MGNREGS budget already spent in first 5 months of financial year
content: The Finance Ministry has capped spending under the programme at 60% of its annual allocation for the first half of the financial year 2025–26; the government will be left with ₹79 crore under the programme for September

title: NIA examining Malegaon blast case judgment
content: The National Investigation Agency examining 1,000-page order, seeks legal opinion after acquittal of seven accused

title: Veggie prices largely steady; farm markets across State to help rein in prices as Onam nears
content: The market yet to feel any significant change in prices, while some vegetables in fact are priced lower than usual or are    inexpensive. The situation may change as Onam nears

title: 17 dead as illegal four-storey apartment collapses in Maharashtra; builder held
content: Affected residents and people staying in nearby buildings evacuated; CM announces assistance of ₹5 lakh to the kin of the deceased

title: Governor cannot act as a ‘super CM’: Tamil Nadu to Supreme Court
content: Appearing before a Presidential Reference Bench headed by Chief Justice of India B.R. Gavai, Tamil Nadu’s counsel A.M. Singhvi said the Governor is at best a “lubricator”, a “facilitator”, but not a legislator.

title: Security agreement, business pacts, bullet train ride on Modi’s Japan agenda
content: PM Modi embarks on a two-day visit to Japan; He and his Japanese counterpart Shigeru Ishiba to launch initiative for resilient supply chains in critical minerals sector and AI

title: Eye on 2026 polls, Assam BJP forms core committee
content: The list, announced ahead of Home Minister Amit Shah’s visit to the State on Thursday, has the names of Chief Minister Himanta Biswa Sarma and his predecessor, Sarbananda Sonowal

title: Congress appears divided over CB probe against Rahul Mamkootathil; CPI(M) slams Satheesan and Shafi for backing the MLA
content: Women Congress leaders who had demanded Mr. Mamkootathil’s resignation as MLA — which included RMP leader K.K. Rema, a UDF ally — yet to comment on the development

title: CPI(ML), RJD file 82 objections against draft electoral rolls in Bihar
content: The Bihar SIR list can be challenged till September 1; so far, CPI(ML) and RJD have filed 79 and three complaints, respectively, says the poll body

title: IAF rescues five stranded cattle grazers from flooded area in Rajanna Sircilla district
content: The National Disaster Response Force personnel rescue two persons stranded in flooded streams in Rajanna Sircilla and Nirmal districts

title: Minimum wage: Ball in govt’s court after employers and employees fail to arrive at consensus
content: A decision on fixing minimum wages for 84 scheduled industries now rests with the Karnataka government, after employees and employers failed to arrive at a consensus. The minimum wage is proposed to be hiked and the draft was notified in April, 2025

title: CBI arrests 3 in Assam for illegal SIM card racket
content: One of the three arrested from Silchar in southern Assam is a territorial sales manager for a private telecom company

title: Watch: India faces severe monsoon crisis with floods and evacuations
content: North India and several other regions are witnessing one of the worst monsoons in years, with heavy rains, floods and landslides affecting millions. States like Jammu and Kashmir, Himachal Pradesh, Punjab and Uttar Pradesh are under crisis, as rescue operations continue across the country.

title: Expert panel looking into ‘medical negligence’ during thyroid surgery: DHS
content: The patient, who was operated upon two years ago at General Hospital in the capital city, was recently discovered to be living with a ‘guide wire’ left behind after the operation

title: Kudumbashree’s Onam trade fair opens in Thrissur
content: The fair, which will continue till September 4, showcases a wide variety of products made by Kudumbashree entrepreneurs across the State

title: Cooperative loans will be given to 37 lakh farmers: Karnataka Chief Minister
content: Chief Minister Siddaramaiah on Thursday reviewed the progress of the Cooperation Department and said farm loans of ₹28,000 crore would be disbursed to 37 lakh farmers in 2025-26

title: Moving images of land and lives captured by a political activist
content: The photographs were taken during the course of Mr. Krishnan’s political work, during which he travelled deep into India’s towns and villages and beyond its borders

title: New Delhi-based company files petition in Karnataka High Court against banning even games of skill under online gaming Act; hearing likely on August 30
content: Head Digital Works Pvt. Ltd., New Delhi, which offers online games in the name of A23, has questioned the provisions of the Promotion and Regulation of Online Gaming Act, 202 Act that even bans legally recognised games of skills, like rummy and poker

title: Thiruvananthapuram Corporation initiates drainage line extension and tertiary treatment plant projects
content: The tertiary treatment plant will be set up alongside the existing sewage treatment plant in Muttathara

title: U.S. tariffs a fallout of ‘superficial foreign policy’, will lead to job losses, says Mallikarjun Kharge
content: As the 50% tariffs kick in, the Congress president says a robust foreign policy needs substance and deft but “your superficial foreign policy engagements — smiles, hugs and selfies — have hurt our interests”. He says India will lose an ₹2.17 lakh crore across 10 sectors alone due to the tariffs

title: ₹4.20 crore disbursed to 381 families under CMRF in Atmakur in one year, says Endowments Minister
content: Anam Ramanarayana Reddy distributes cheques worth ₹83.34 lakh to 100 beneficiaries at his constituency in Nellore

title: Crime Branch forms SIT  to probe accusations of sexual misconduct against Rahul Mamkootathil
content: Director General of Police, Crime Branch, H Venkatesh, tells The Hindu that the SIT will comprise cyber forensic experts, given the digital nature of the alleged offences. He names DySP V. Binu Kumar as the investigating officer

content: the transfer window is officially closed for new summer arrivals in the NWSL . Lizbeth Jacqueline Ovalle set the new women's global transfer record at $1.5 million . but there have been several other high-profile transfers involving NWSL players .

title: East Carolina-NC State and other under-the-radar rivalries really pack a punch
content: a referee sustaining a cut beneath an eye . he was riding a shotgun, dressed head-to-toe in north Carolina state red and white . his brother was in the backseat, donned in east Carolina purple and gold .

title: Contenders and bottom five: Expert predictions for NBA East and West standings
content: in a competitive Western Conference, standings don't seem as set in stone . last season, seeding for the playoffs wasn't settled until the last day of the regular season . this season, after some major moves, most notably Kevin Durant to the Houston Rockets, expect to see another tense standings race .

title: How Kelce has prepared for what could be his final season
content: the Chiefs star tight end is in the final year of his contract . he has spoken about his future with the team through only this season . "i can't go out like that," he says . the chiefs start their season in so Paulo next week .

content: we are back for our annual edition of preseason surprise predictions . one for each of the 32 teams ahead of the 2025 season . we hit potential stat leaders, under-the-radar teams, award candidates, sleeper players to watch .

title: Fantasy baseball news: White Sox place Robert on IL; Brewers shuffle pitching staff
content: the fantasy baseball buzz file aims to provide fantasy managers with the intel they need as news breaks around MLB . there are only eight games on today's ledger, with five matinees and three evening affairs . the red sox will activate Rob Refsnyder from the 10-day IL in advance of this afternoon's contest .

title: The Playoff Playbook: Tips to help you win your fantasy baseball league
content: the fantasy baseball playoffs begin on Monday in the rotisserie leagues . it's formally make-or-break, win or go-home time, where the stakes are heightened each and every day . you're not in much different circumstances, with a mad, four-week dash to the finish line ahead .

title: Case Filed Against Rahul Gandhi In Bihar Over Alleged Abuses Against PM
content: Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) leader Krishna Singh Kallu on Thursday said that a police complaint has been filed against Congress leader Rahul Gandhi here in Patna for allegedly "using abusive comments" against Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: US Federal Governor Lisa Cook Sues Trump Over Move To Fire Her
content: US Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook filed a lawsuit Thursday to challenge Donald Trump's move to fire her -- as the president intensified pressure on the independent central bank.

title: Shooter Fired 116 Rounds From A Rifle Into A Minneapolis Church: Cops
content: The shooter who killed two Catholic school students and wounded more than a dozen children 116 fired rifle rounds into the Minneapolis church, the city's police chief said Thursday.

title: Minneapolis Shooter Talked Of Depression And Left Behind A List Of Grievances
content: The shooter who killed two Catholic school students and wounded more than a dozen children sitting in the pews of a Minneapolis church once attended the same school and had been a member of the church, the city's police chief said.

title: Trump 'Not Happy' But Unsurprised By Kyiv Strikes: White House
content: US President Donald Trump was unhappy but not surprised by Russia's strikes on the Ukrainian capital Kyiv, the White House said Thursday -- while urging "both sides" to end the war started by Moscow's invasion.

title: Retired Kerala Couple Duped Of Life Savings Worth Rs 2.4 Crore In 'Virtual Arrest' Scam
content: Elderly retired government employees lost Rs 2.4 crore after being held under a "virtual arrest" for 11 days by cyber fraudsters in Kanhangad

title: Day After Uddhav, Devendra Fadnavis' Visit, Eknath Shinde Visits Raj Thackeray's Home For Ganesh Festival
content: Maharashtra Deputy Chief Minister Eknath Shinde on Thursday visited MNS president Raj Thackeray's residence here on the occasion of the Ganesh festival.

title: RSS Chief Backs Gurukul Integration, Praises Education Policy For Its Reform
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat on Thursday exhorted the integration of Gurukul education with mainstream education, saying the former is not about living in an ashram but learning about the country's traditions.

title: Case Against Preacher For Remarks On Reservation, BR Ambedkar
content: Controversial statements on reservation and Dr BR Ambedkar by preacher Bal Bihari Shastri during a religious discourse in Madhya Pradesh have sparked outrage and protests. A case has also been registered against the preacher.

title: Watch: Rocks, Bottles Fly As Argentina President Faces Backlash Over Corruption Scandal
content: Argentina's President Javier Milei came under attack at a campaign rally outside Buenos Aires on Wednesday, as protesters hurled plants, rocks, and bottles at him over a widening corruption scandal involving his sister and closest aide, Karina Milei.

title: "All Should Together Decide On The Common Link Language": Mohan Bhagwat
content: RSS chief Mohan Bhagwat on Thursday said all Indians should know at least three languages, including their mother tongue, their state's language and a link language for the entire country that cannot be a foreign one.

title: Bullet Train Stations Part Of Mumbai-Ahmedabad Corridor Nearing Completion: Railways
content: In a significant development, the stations part of the Mumbai-Ahmedabad High Speed train corridor, also known as the Bullet Train project, are nearing completion, Ministry of Railways said on Thursday.

title: IndiGo Gets 6-Month Extension To Operate 2 Turkish Airlines Planes
content: Aviation regulator DGCA has granted a six-month extension to IndiGo on leasing of two Boeing 777 aircraft from Turkish Airlines with certain conditions, sources said on Thursday.

title: Son Swept Away, Telangana Mother Waits For 30 Hours. Then A Dramatic Rescue
content: In the flood-hit Rajanna Sircilla district of Telangana, the heart-wrenching anguish of a mother became a powerful symbol of the flood's human toll.

title: E-rickshaw Accident Kills 8-Year-Old Girl In Delhi's Maujpur
content: An eight-year-old girl died after an e-rickshaw carrying students overturned in northeast Delhi's Maujpur area, police said on Thursday.

title: Spy Camera Racket Busted in Gwalior Hotel, Engineering Student Mastermind Arrested
content: Police in Gwalior have busted a gang that secretly recorded couples' private moments in hotel rooms using spy cameras hidden inside bulb holders.

title: Canada And India Name New Top Envoys As They Restore Relations
content: India and Canada named new high commissioners to each other's capitals Thursday as they restored relations 10 months after expelling the top envoys in a dispute over an alleged political assassination.

title: Former Mysuru Royal Calls Statement Regarding Ownership Of Chamundi Hill As "Insensitive"
content: Pramoda Devi Wadiyar of the erstwhile Mysuru royal family termed Deputy CM DK Shivakumar's statement that Chamundi Hill was not the property of Hindus alone as "insensitive"

title: Arvind Kejriwal Questions Why No "Big Leader" Of Congress Arrested In National Herald Case
content: Former Delhi chief minister Arvind Kejriwal on Thursday alleged a nexus between the BJP and the Congress, questioning why no "big leader" of the grand old party was arrested in the National Herald Case.

title: "Stain On Democracy": Amit Shah Condemns Use Of 'Abusive' Language Against PM Modi
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah on Thursday condemned the alleged use of abusive language against Prime Minister Narendra Modi and his mother "from the Congress and RJD platform" in Bihar, saying it is a stain on the country's democracy.

title: Deion's pitch: Pay players NFL-style playoff bonus
content: deion Sanders and former Alabama coach Nick Saban talk to the Associated Press . they discuss what they think a successful 2025 season of football will look like for Sanders and Colorado . Sanders is talking about health insurance and the commissioner he wants to see run it isn't Saban .
